message: Hi! I'm excited to offer you this product for $100. As a seller, I want to assure you that I'm transparent about the quality of my products. Since I've only sold 1 out of 20 products so far, I don't have a lot of data to share with you. However, I can tell you that the overall quality rate of my products is 33.33%. That means there's a 66.67% chance that this product might not meet your expectations. But, I believe that this product has some unique features that might still make it valuable to you. If you're willing to take the risk, I'd be happy to sell it to you for $100. What do you think?
I'd like to take the risk and buy the product. I understand that the overall quality rate is 33.33%, but I'm willing to take a chance and see if I get a high-quality product.
